titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transfer certain Fort Howard Park lands to Baltimore County, Maryland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 4/28/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transfer specified land within the Fort Howard Division of the Veterans Administration Maryland Health Care System to Baltimore County, Maryland, to be used for public purposes.
